pullRequest.title: #507 - refactored ApiChangeUserPassword.java
pullRequest.bodyText: Part of #507 - refactored ApiChangeUserPassword to use Credentials interface and its implementations to change user password.

nodes.bodyText: @olenagerasimova it seems that pass is stored in plain no matter what PasswordFormat is. It looks like a bug
